name: slide_SDTM_to_BCs
query: match(domain:Domain)-[r1]->(var:Variable)-[r2]->(crm:CRMNode)<-[r3]-(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r4]-(bc:BiomedicalConcept) where domain.name in ['VS','AE'] and crm.sdtm='--LOC' RETURN domain, r1, var, r2, crm, r3, bc_prop, r4, bc
query_table: match(domain:Domain)-[r1]->(var:Variable)-[r2]->(crm:CRMNode)<-[r3]-(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r4]-(bc:BiomedicalConcept) where domain.name in ['VS','AE'] and crm.sdtm='--LOC' RETURN domain.name as Domain, var.name as Variable, crm.sdtm as `CRM Node`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`

name: slide_TEMP_to_SDTM
query: MATCH (bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r1]-(bc:BiomedicalConcept)<-[r2]-(act:Activity)<-[r6]-(SD:StudyDesign)-[r7]->(bc) where bc.name='Temperature' OPTIONAL match(bc)<-[r8]-(domain:Domain)-[r3]->(var:Variable)-[r4]->(crm:CRMNode)<-[r5]-(bc_prop) RETURN bc_prop, r1, bc, r2, act, r6, SD, r7, domain, r8, var, r3, crm, r4, r5
query_table: MATCH (bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r1]-(bc:BiomedicalConcept)<-[r2]-(act:Activity)<-[r6]-(SD:StudyDesign)-[r7]->(bc) where bc.name='Temperature' OPTIONAL match(bc)<-[r8]-(domain:Domain)-[r3]->(var:Variable)-[r4]->(crm:CRMNode)<-[r5]-(bc_prop) RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, act.name as Activity, SD.name as `Study Design`, domain.name as Domain, var.name as Variable, crm.sdtm as `CRM Node`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`

name: slide_dataContact
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc, r1, bc_prop, r2, dc
query_table: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, dc.uri as `Data Contract`

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc, r1, bc_prop, r2, dc, r3, sai
query_table: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, dc.uri as `Data Contract`, sai.name as `Scheduled Activity Instance`

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Timeline
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance)where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH(sai)-[r4]->(epoch:StudyEpoch),(sai)-[r5]->(encounter:Encounter),(sai)<-[r6]-(timeline:ScheduleTimeline)-[r7]->(timing:Timing)-[r8]->(sai) RETURN bc, r1, bc_prop, r2, dc, r3, sai, r4, epoch, r5, encounter, r6, timeline, r7, timing, r8
query_table: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance)where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH(sai)-[r4]->(epoch:StudyEpoch),(sai)-[r5]->(encounter:Encounter),(sai)<-[r6]-(timeline:ScheduleTimeline)-[r7]->(timing:Timing)-[r8]->(sai) RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, dc.uri as `Data Contract`, sai.name as `Scheduled Activity Instance`, epoch.name as `Study Epoch`, encounter.name as `Encounter`, timeline.name as `Schedule Timeline`, timing.name as `Timing`

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Screen1
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc, r1, bc_prop, r2, dc, r3, sai
query_table: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, dc.uri as `Data Contract`, sai.name as `Scheduled Activity Instance`

name: slide_dataContact_ScheduledActivityInstance_Screen1_with_data
query: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH (dc)<-[r4]-(dp:DataPoint)-[r5]->(subj:Subject) RETURN bc, r1, bc_prop, r2, dc, r3, sai, r4, dp, r5, subj
query_table: MATCH (bc:BiomedicalConcept)-[r1]->(bc_prop:BiomedicalConceptProperty)<-[r2]-(dc:DataContract)-[r3]->(sai:ScheduledActivityInstance) where bc.name in ['Informed Consent Obtained','Date of Birth'] and bc_prop.generic_name in ['--STDTC', 'BRTHDTC'] OPTIONAL MATCH (dc)<-[r4]-(dp:DataPoint)-[r5]->(subj:Subject) RETURN bc.name as `Biomedical Concept`, bc_prop.generic_name as `BC Property`, dc.uri as `Data Contract`, sai.name as `Scheduled Activity Instance`, dp.value as `Data Point Value`, subj.identifier as `Subject ID`
